Name: Floating Balloon Riding
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Float high in the sky on a balloon.
Travel by riding a Floating Balloon.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
fly the sky on a floating balloon. Double click the desired destination on the world map and automatically fly to the designated location via navigation. (Auto pilot is available only in some continents including victoria island. Purchase flight permit from Instructor Irvin and expand the number of continents available for smart riding.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Float high in the sky on a balloon.
Travel by riding a Floating Balloon.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 150, Auto Pilot MSPD: Normal, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 150, Auto Pilot MSPD: Normal, Jump: 120
